scripts.win:android:uat:build: set 'ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=%npm_package_config_android_uat%' && npm run bundle:android && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.win:android:stg:build: set 'ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=%npm_package_config_android_stg%' && npm run bundle:android && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.win:android:prd:build: set 'ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=%npm_package_config_android_prd%' && npm run bundle:android && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.mac:android:uat:build: export ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_uat && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.mac:android:stg:build: export ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_stg && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.mac:android:prd:build: export ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_prd && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.win:ios:uat:build: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Building iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.win:ios:stg:build: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Building iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.win:ios:prd:build: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Building iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.mac:ios:uat:build: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_uat && npm run mac:ios:clean && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme 'example' -configuration Release 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.mac:ios:stg:build: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_stg && npm run mac:ios:clean && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme 'example' -configuration Release 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.mac:ios:prd:build: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_prd && npm run mac:ios:clean && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme 'example' -configuration Release 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.mac:ios:clean: rm -rf ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock; cd ios && pod install && cd ..
